title: Balance-holistic by Shabnam J. kamal - Encinitas, CA
description: Specialties: Shab offers healing sessions including Ayurvedic Shirodhara, Subtle body energy cleansing, and Spiritual coaching all based on Ayurvedic principles and her medical experiences. With her unique approach to customizing healing sessions for each client, she delivers a gentle session with utmost care. Shab relies on her super-powerful intuition to help her clients with their life challenges. Her sessions will reduce stress, anxiety, and insomnia in the body and mind. Established in 2013. This practice is based on Ayurvedic principles, Spirituality, and living a healthy life. Shab started this part-time based practice as she was working in Northern California hospitals as a healthcare professional in the field of Radiation therapy/Oncology. She retired from her hospital work in 2021 and decided to put her energy into building her healing practice in Southern California, San Diego County. This healing practice moves around with her from Carlsbad to Encinitas as she teaches Yoga and Ayurveda, Restoratives yoga classes, and her healing work.

She has the power to help you heal; if you totally believe. She has helped me to face my dark times I highly recommend Shab. - 8/23/2022 The moment you meet Shab, you feel the positive energy around her and immediately you feel safe to open up and share without reserves. If you're looking to incorporate Ayurveda practices in your life look no further. Shab is the real deal. - 6/16/2014 I met Shab at a workshop on Aryuvedic healing. I was immediately drawn to her compassion, knowledge and approach. Every session with Shab was powerful and unique. I felt stronger, balanced and more physically empowered after each session. Aryuvedic medicine has so many wonderful principles, I'm glad I added these methods and dietary tips into my daily routine. - 12/16/2012First to Review Shab is one of the most calming and compassionate people I've ever met. She takes the time to listen to your physical, mental and emotional health concerns. Her approach is gentle and she is very knowledgable in the field of Ayurveda and other techniques to help you heal. I sought the advice of Shab to help me with my Crohn's Disease. She guided me through the entire process, which included meal planning, daily herbal supplements and meditation. She was in contact with me weekly and was always available for any of my questions or concerns. Shab is a gifted practitioner and I would highly recommend her to anyone seeking a holistic approach to their health. M.
